item.title: Exclusive Access: JioTV+ Now Available on Smart TVs
item.description: Only JioFiber and AirFiber customers may access the JioTV+ app, and not all plans are compatible.

item.title: Chromecast Era Ends: Google Introduces New Streaming Device
item.description: Google is removing Chromecast and redesigning the Google TV Streamer to resemble a set-top box.

item.title: "Xiaomi TV users rejoice: Over 12,000 free movies now available on new streaming platform"
item.description: While popular streaming services like Netflix and Disney+ offer a plethora of content for viewers to choose from, not everyone can afford the subscription fees. That's where eFilm Online comes in. This free platform offers a library of over 12,000 movies that users can access without paying a dime. And the best part? You can watch these movies on any of your devices.

item.title: Indian TV shipment sees double digit growth
item.description: India's smart TV shipments grew 38% year-on-year in Q3 2022, according to the latest research from Counterpoint. This growth is primarily due to the various sales during the festive season.

item.title: Best 5 Home Theater Systems Under Rs 10K
item.description: You should invest in a quality home theater system if you love entertainment, mainly because today’s TVs do not offer excellent audio facilities. Connecting your smart TV to the home theater system can enhance the feel and provide a cinema-like experience in your drawing-room. The exciting aspect is that home theater systems are available in various pricing budgets. Let us discuss five quality home theater systems available in India for under Rs 10,000.

item.title: Best 5 Smart TVs under Rs 50,000
item.description: With the plethora of OTT channels available on the internet, investing in a smart TV makes sense. Fortunately, you have an exciting range of smart TVs available in the Rs 50K budget. Brands like LG, Sony, Samsung, Xiaomi, Panasonic, VU, etc., offer extensive choices. This article picks out the top five best smart TVs under Rs 50K. Meanwhile, let us understand what a smart TV is.

item.title: Best Smart TVs Available in India only Under 20,000
item.description: These smart LED TVs come in with many features and provide you an amazing viewing experience and that all with no extra money asked and you can buy them through online retails stores and e-commerce websites too.
